errorMessages.authenticationErrorBody: Connection with Microsoft 365 has been lost and data might be outdated. Please refresh the page.

presets.emptyDescription: Hover over one of the presets to view the details
presets.noClose: You cannot close the preset chooser. Choose a preset or cancel the creation by pressing x.

emptyState.heading: Choose a teams preset
emptyState.body: Team presets allow you to quickly create a team with the people involved in this issue. Please select a preset that fits the type of conversation you want to create!

emptyState.heading: Choose a meeting preset
emptyState.body: Meeting presets allow you to quickly schedule meetings with the people involved in this issue. Please select a preset that fits the type of meeting you want to schedule!

emptyState.heading: Choose an email preset
emptyState.body: Email presets allow you to quickly send emails to the people involved in this issue. Please select a preset that fits the type of email you want to send!

email.detailDescription: Default template for emails. It will fill the subject with an issue's summary.

meetings.detailDescription: Default template for meetings. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.

chat.detailDescription: Default template for chats. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.

templateChooser.noTemplatesGlobalAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates in the global app settings or project settings.
templateChooser.noTemplatesProjectAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates for your project in the project settings.

officeLoginScreen.heading: Welcome to {{ appName }}
officeLoginScreen.description: Looks like you're using the app for the first time. Please log in with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!
